Frequently Asked Questions
Cannot hear reminder sounds

Go to Phone Settings → Apps → To-Do List → Sound & notifications, enable “Allow sound” and check if your phone is in Silent/Vibrate mode. You can also go to Settings in the app → Reminder Sound to select a different alert tone.
Not receiving task notifications

Please check:
• Phone Settings → Notifications → To-Do List → is it enabled?
• Battery → Battery optimization → select “Don’t optimize” for the To-Do List app.
• Some Xiaomi, OPPO, Vivo phones require enabling “Autostart” and “Lock app in the background”.
How to sync the to-do list between devices?
Currently, the free version does not support synchronization. Syncing via Google/Firestore account will be available in the upcoming Pro version (expected update in January 2026).
How to set weekly recurring reminders
When adding/editing a task → tap “Repeat” → select “Weekly” → check the days of the week you want (Monday, Wednesday, Friday…) → Save. The task will automatically repeat on those specific days.
How to change the app’s interface and colors?

Go to Menu (≡) → Settings → Theme & Color → choose one of the 10+ available themes (Blue, Pink, Dark, Purple Galaxy…). You can also enable “System default” to have the app automatically switch between light/dark mode according to your phone’s settings.
Will my data be lost if I uninstall the app?

→ If you only use the free version (local storage): your data will be lost upon uninstallation.\n→ If you have logged into an account and enabled sync (upcoming Pro version): your data will be saved on the cloud and will be restored upon reinstallation.
Can I share my to-do list with friends?

Yes! Go to the list → tap the Share button (send icon) → select “Export to text” or “Send shareable link” (coming in the December 2025 update). Currently, you can take a screenshot or copy individual tasks to send to your friends.
Does the app support home screen widgets?

Of course! Long-press an empty space on your home screen → select Widgets → drag the “To-Do List” widget out. There are 3 sizes: 4x1 (short list), 4x3 (with a quick add button), and a beautiful transparent widget.
